{/* Hero Section */}

import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact: React.FC = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); alert('ส่งข้อความสำเร็จ!'); }; return (

setFormData({...formData, name: e.target.value})} className="w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="" />
setFormData({...formData, email: e.target.value})} className="w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="" />
setFormData({...formData, subject: e.target.value})} className="w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="" />
